title: The Fighting Spirit
description:
Shukri reviews the sports anime, Hajime no Ippo (The Fighting Spirit). This anime series has stood the test of time, with an emphasis on grit, perseverance, and industry. If you like inspirational stories, this is the show for you. 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
